events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all, and I want to return it for a full refund.
The reported issue has been categorized under 'Refund' as the customer is requesting a return and money back.
An agent has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your return and refund for the jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 4582679, and yes, the jacket is brand new. I havenâ€™t removed any tags or worn it outside yet.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your return request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label; that makes the process much easier for me.
Your refund request has been successfully initiated once we receive the returned jacket at our warehouse.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you received the refund notification after your jacket return was processed last week.
Yes, I got the refund in full yesterday. Thank you for the smooth service and assistance throughout the process.
We are glad your refund was successful and the issue is resolved. Closing this case now, and thank you for choosing us.
